text: Wesley Ribeiro Silva (born 30 March 1999), commonly known as Wesley, is a Brazilian footballer who currently plays as a winger for Palmeiras. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Palmeiras |2019 |Série A |0||0||0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||0||0 |- |Vitória (loan) |2019 |Série B |28||5||0||0||0||0||colspan="2" |–||0||0||28||5 |- |Palmeiras |2020 |Série A |7 |0 |3 |0 |0 |0 |1 |0 |0 |0 |11 |0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !35!!5!!3!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!39!!5 |} ;Notes ==References== ==External links== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras players Category:Esporte Clube Vitória players
